ARABIC: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى لَآ أَمْلِكُ إِلَّا نَفْسِى وَأَخِى فَٱفْرُقْ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْفَٰسِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'My Lord, I have no control over anyone but myself and my brother, so make a clear distinction between us and this deviant people.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Said (Moses): "O Lord, I have control over none but myself and my brother; so distinguish between us and these, the wicked people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thereupon Moses said: 'My Lord! I have control over none but my own self and my brother; so distinguish between us and the transgressing people.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Moses) said, "Lord, I can only speak for myself and my brother; keep us away from the evil-doers".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Moosa, “My Lord! I have no control except over myself and my brother, so keep us separated from the disobedient nation.” (Do not count us among them).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He [Musa] said: "O my Lord! I have power only over myself and my brother, so Ifruq us from the rebellious people!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: My Lord! Surely I have no control (upon any) but my own self and my brother; therefore make a separation between us and the nation of transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'O my Lord, I rule no one except myself and my brother. So do Thou divide between us and the people of the ungodly.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: My Lord! I have control of none but myself and my brother, so distinguish between us and the wrong-doing folk.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses supplicated, "Lord, I have power over none but myself and my brother; so separate us from the disobedient people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Said he: my Lord control not but myself and my brother, so decide Thou between us and this transgressing people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘My Lord! I have no power over [anyone] except myself and my brother, so part us from the transgressing lot.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "O my Lord! I have power only over myself and my brother: so separate us from this rebellious people!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He [Musa (Moses)] said: "O my Lord! I have power only over myself and my brother, so separate us from the people who are the Fasiqun (rebellious and disobedient to Allah)!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'Lord, I have none but myself and my brother. Set a barrier between us and the wicked people'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “My Lord! I have control only over myself and my brother, so separate between us and between the wicked people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Moses] said, "My Lord, indeed I do not possess except myself and my brother, so part us from the defiantly disobedient people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [5:25] He, Moses, thereupon, said, ‘My Lord, I control none but myself and my brother, and I control no one else to be able to force them to obedience. So separate, distinguish, us from the wicked folk’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said: My Lord!) Moses said: my Lord! (I have control of none but myself and my brother, so distinguish between us) judge between us (and the wrong-doing folk) the contravening folk.
